title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 1000.3 - Initial Filings; Active Management of Causes; Settlement or Mediation Program
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 1000.3 - Initial Filings; Active Management of Causes; Settlement or Mediation Program

State Regulations
(a) The Court does
not require the filing of an initial informational statement pursuant 22 NYCRR
1250.3
(a). (b) The Court does not
have a settlement or mediation program pursuant to 22 NYCRR
1250.3
(c). Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22
ยง
1000.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
